original_text: And you came near and stood at the foot of the mountain, while the mountain burned with fire to the heart of heaven, wrapped in darkness, cloud, and gloom.
korean_text: 너희가 가까이 나아와서 산 아래에 서니 그 산에 불이 붙어 불길이 충천하고 어둠과 구름과 흑암이 덮였는데

sentences.original_text: and stood at the foot of the mountain
while the mountain burned with fire to the heart of heaven
wrapped in darkness, cloud, and gloom.
